Description: Rim sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed (fired red) below; two added white bands; top of rim glazed; exterior: largely reserved; dot and billet pattern band around rim; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number '25' is written in pencil on the sherd's exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 20.23)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0976) (phase 2)
